CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c )) , TEXT(YEAR(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c)) + "/" + IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c))) > 1 , TEXT(MONTH(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c)), "0" + TEXT(MONTH(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c))) + "/" + IF(LEN(TEXT(DAY(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c))) > 1 , TEXT(DAY(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c)), "0" + TEXT(DAY(CaseId__r.Account.Birthdate__c))), IF( NOT(ISBLANK( NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c )) , TEXT(YEAR(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c )) + "/" + IF( LEN(TEXT(MONTH(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c ))) > 1 , TEXT(MONTH(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c )), "0" + TEXT(MONTH(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c ))) + "/" + IF(LEN(TEXT(DAY(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c ))) > 1 , TEXT(DAY(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c )), "0" + TEXT(DAY(NumeroIdCliente__r.Birthdate__c ))), '') )
CustomField.label: FENACCON
